description: Detects disabling Windows Defender threat protection Author: Ján Trenčanský, frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Defender Threat Detection Disabled
query: (winlog.channel:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:("5001" OR "5010" OR "5012" OR "5101"))
